mapper.select: SELECT name,id,sort FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN super_admin = 1 THEN '超级管理员' ELSE '' END name, '1' as id, 9999 as sort FROM boot_sys_user WHERE id = #{userId} UNION SELECT boot_sys_role.`name`, boot_sys_role.id, boot_sys_role.sort FROM boot_sys_role, boot_sys_user_role WHERE boot_sys_role.id = boot_sys_user_role.role_id AND boot_sys_user_role.user_id = #{userId} ) tmp WHERE name <> '' order by sort desc
